ModMetaData.name: Over-Wall Nutrient Paste Dispenser (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Primus the Conquerer
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/buuPQel.png[/img] Update of Primus the Conquerers mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2074245348
[img]https://i.imgur.com/pufA0kM.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://invite.gg/Mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/OverWallNutrientPasteDispenser][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/WjDSfUn.png[/img][/td] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/Be8E2qJ.png[/img][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img] [h1]I unfortunately don't have the time anymore to play and update my mods. If anyone wants to update/change the mod. Feel free to do that. :)[/h1]
[h1]Description[/h1]
I hate how the Vanilla Nutrient Paste Dispenser isn't 100% flush with the Wall. So i made a Over-Wall Nutrient Paste Dispenser inspired by the Over-Wall Cooler from [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1372003680]Replace Stuff[/url].
[b]If you're using the Dispenser in a Prison and your Prisoners aren't using it, place a Door under the Dispenser like shown here: https://imgur.com/VA8HAQ1 It is how the Game is designed and i can't do much about it. This is the easiest and cheapest Solution i could find. I'm Sorry. :([/b]
[h1]Compatibility[/h1]
A Patch for [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2043895447]NPD Tiers[/url] is included.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/PwoNOj4.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [/list]
